title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, push models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM, Chat and Embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous/asynchronous APIs, streaming, embeddings, model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple idiomatic interface to chat, generate and manage models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced Go CLI for Ollama with progress bars, batch prompts and shell completion.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama REST API with GenServer streaming and LiveView hooks.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with tokio streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with chat, generate, embeddings and model APIs.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama using std.http with async I/O and build.zig integration.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js wrapper around Ollama REST API exposing Promise and stream interfaces.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama: use local models as Generator, Ranker or Embedder in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in containers with one command.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB + Streamlit for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of Modelfiles for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma, CodeLlama and more ready to pull.
